name: simple-shopify-store
description: A simple Shopify theme built with Liquid templating language

scripts.start: concurrently "npx http-server -p 3000 -o" "npx nodemon --watch . --ext liquid,css,js --exec echo 'Files changed - refresh browser'"
scripts.watch: npx nodemon --watch . --ext liquid,css,js --exec echo 'Files changed at %time%'
scripts.build: npm run check && npm run zip

author: Aditya Dhakane
